attributes.action: Drugs and alcohol awareness - Make PSHE compulsory in schools
attributes.additional_details:
PSHE - Personal, Social and Health Education

A lot children do not know enough about the effect associated with drugs and alcohol, with PSHE being taught in schools children will become aware of the risks that come with drugs and alcohol, and other PSHE topics.

The government should make PSHE lessons compulsory in all schools across the UK, so that pupils gain an understanding of PSHE topics.
